description:

title: Scenes Across America - 2017 Desk Calendars (Set of 50)
description:
This small format desk calendar is narrow and spiral bound and   features scenic photographs from across North America. It is      different  than our original desk calendars as it features only 6 pages      plus cover for  possibly reduced postal rates.* Planning pages are   not    included.
July through December pages are printed on the back of the January      through  June pages. When you turn the page from June, simply turn the      calendar around  and the rest of the year continues. Your imprint  is  on    both sides of the  calendar, so your name stays at the bottom  of  the    current month.

*Check with your post office for postage rates.  Any      additional  inserts will increase postage.  Postage rates and      regulations vary by year and  post office. We recommend that you request      a free sample and take it to your local  post office.
